Class ConsolidateGroupThread

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      jpo.ConsolidateGroupThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ConsolidateGroupThread
extends java.lang.Thread

a class that moves all pictures of a group to a target directory

run

enumerateGroup

private boolean enumerateGroup(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode groupNode)
recursively invoked method to report all groups.

Returns:
True if ok, false if a problem occured.

moveHighresPicture

private boolean moveHighresPicture(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode n)
This method moves a highres file from an indicated SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode 's PictureInfo object to the target directory. It returns true if the move was successful or ignored false if there was a problem

Returns:
True if the move was successfull or False if it was not.

moveLowresPicture

private boolean moveLowresPicture(SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode n)
This method moves a highres file from an indicated SortableDefaultMutableTreeNode 's PictureInfo object to the target directory. It returns true if the move was successful or ignored false if there was a problem

Returns:
True if the move was successfull or False if it was not.
